question: Which Chinese sprinter has been recently appointed to the Athletes Commission of World Athletics?
explanation: Chinese sprinter Su Bingtian has been appointed to the Athletes Commission of World Athletics, formerly known as the International Association of Athletics Federations. He is one among the six athletes who were elected to the Commission following a vote by accredited athletes during the 2019 World Athletics Championships in Doha, Qatar. The appointment was approved by the World Athletics Council.
